metadata.title: CVE-2023-25012 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Linux kernel through 6.1.9 has a Use-After-Free in bigben_remove indrivers/hid/hid-bigbenff.c via a crafted USB device because the LEDcontrollers remain registered for too long.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
